name: places/ChIJt8l5Wp5ZwokRFGKH0NKYXyM
formattedAddress: 241 E 14th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 241 E 14th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Literally the best place I’ve gotten my nails done in New york! Angela is amazing and is a perfectionist to make sure it’s exactly what you want! Also extremely affordable price especially for the quality. My friend for gel x extensions with a design and I got powder dip with chrome for less than anywhere else I’ve been in the city.

text.text: Literally the best place I’ve gotten my nails done in New york! Angela is amazing and is a perfectionist to make sure it’s exactly what you want! Also extremely affordable price especially for the quality. My friend for gel x extensions with a design and I got powder dip with chrome for less than anywhere else I’ve been in the city.

originalText.text: Great place to get gel-x done! Tracy did an amazing job and took such good care of my nails and cuticles. Well priced! Highly recommend!

text.text: Great place to get gel-x done! Tracy did an amazing job and took such good care of my nails and cuticles. Well priced! Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
As a first timer, so pleased with their work. The lady sitting next to me lives nearby and raved about this is her go to spot in the past three years in the neighborhood after trying a few. The staff know her so well they know her colors and style she likes!

Tina did a great base coat. The dark shimmery blue gel color I chose looked purple on my nail which wasn’t my inspo so after two coats they were quick to find me a dark blue top layer. Then it was Angela’s turn to paint the white flower petals on. She was so careful and repeated some of the flowers to get the perfect shape, I really appreciate how much care she put in. The nail art design was $35 extra and so worth it!

We tried 4-5 shades of white and yellow dots for the center but Angela found a gold color which fit the vibe way more. A pale yellow and white was too light of color in contrast to the dramatic dark blue background. they really put in the work and time, and gave me massages before and after. I was expecting to be there for an hour or so but this probably took closer to two hours when i left. A bit longer than I expected but I also took some time deciding the color I wanted in the beginning. All in all I’m really happy with this place and have already gotten tons of compliments. Total including tip was $117. Thank you Angela and Tina!

originalText.text: I’ve been coming here for over a year and will never go anywhere else. Angela is the BEST, she does my dip manicure nails perfectly every time and also gets the shape just right. She’s also a very kind person. Their pedicures are also great and my gel will last for at least 6 weeks (and still look decent after all that grow out). The rest of the staff are also friendly and accommodating. I’ve had a massage while waiting for my dip to come off from Tom and it was just what I needed that day. I recommend making an appointment because they get busy depending on the day! For good reason :)

originalText.text: I had a great experience here! I needed to find a salon that was open late, and Sherry did an amazing job on my nails. I also had a very damaged nail and she was gentle in handling it and still made it look great next to my other nails.
